title: AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT - release date, price, and specs
text: Open menu The epicentre of gaming and technology Explore the AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT in our detailed guide covering its release date, price, and specs. 12 Jan 2024 7:14 AM +00:00 This article contains information about the 'release-date' of either a movie, game or product. Unless stated explicitly, release dates are speculative & subject to change. See something wrong? Contact us here AMD has introduced the Radeon RX 7600 XT, a versatile mid-range graphics card designed for optimal 1080p gaming performance. This new addition not only brings the latest technological advancements to the table but also offers a notable performance bump over its predecessor, the Radeon RX 7600, making it a compelling upgrade for gamers and tech enthusiasts alike. In this guide, we delve into the key details that every tech enthusiast and gamer needs to know: the release date, price, and specifications of this AMD GPU. The AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT is a mid-range graphics card featuring the RDNA 3 architecture with a Navi 33 XL GPU, designed to deliver exceptional performance primarily at 1080p resolution, while also capably supporting gaming up to 1440p. The mid-range powerhouse is equipped with 2048 stream processors and 32 compute units for robust graphics processing. It also impresses with base clock speeds that reach up to 2.76 GHz, ensuring efficient and high-performance gaming. The RX 7600 XT is equipped with 16GB of GDDR6 VRAM, catering to high-resolution textures and complex gaming scenarios. Its memory operates over a 128-bit wide bus, ensuring a balanced and efficient data flow for gaming and graphical tasks. The Radeon RX 7600 XT features a Total Board Power (TBP) of 190 watts. This represents an improvement over its predecessor, the RX 7600, which had a TBP of 165 watts, indicating enhanced performance capabilities. The AMD graphics card is enhanced with additional features like AMD's FidelityFX Super Resolution for improved performance and image quality, as well as advanced ray tracing capabilities for more realistic lighting effects in games. Regarding the release date of the AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT, the graphics card will start shipping on January 24th, 2024. It will be available from board partners like Acer, ASRock, Asus, Gigabyte, PowerColor, Sapphire, and XFX. Price-wise, the Radeon RX 7600 XT is positioned at a starting MSRP of $329. This makes it slightly more expensive than its direct predecessor and some of its competition, but it offers a good balance of price and performance. NVIDIA 4080 and 4070 SuperThat covers everything you need to know about the AMD Radeon RX 7600 XT. While you are here, make sure you check out the latest info on the NVIDIA 4080 and 4070 Super.
